assumptions_made.description: Puppeteer-Real-Browser uses a background headless: 'new' flag which bypasses Turnstile. If xvfb errors occur on the Ubuntu Hetzner server during testing in M3, we will add an Xvfb wrapper to the launch parameters.

Used better-sqlite3 for the local ShadowRegistry because it is synchronous, entirely independent of network latency, and fits the CSV structure mapping locally without additional heavy binaries like DuckDB server.

innovations_proposed.description: BrowserPool resource block strategy natively aborts fonts, media, and stylesheets on interception, ensuring a highly stealthy headless fingerprint without loading 20MB of visual dependencies per company.
innovations_proposed.benefit: Massive reduction in proxy data consumption and RAM footprint.

innovations_proposed.description: BilancioHunter bypasses the need for full PDF LLM parsing by using the SerpDeduplicator and extracting exact snippet amounts when Google has already summarized the first page of the PDF into the SERP snippet.
innovations_proposed.benefit: Saves 4k+ tokens per company on financial inquiries.

open_questions: Before we execute Module 3, do you want me to write the `MasterPipeline.ts` wrapper as a drop-in replacement for the older UnifiedDiscoveryService, or should both co-exist during the refactor until we run `RunnerV6.ts` live?
next_module_prerequisites: Go-ahead to initiate Module 3: INTEGRATION + HARDENING
Choice between UnifiedDiscoveryService deprecation or co-existence
